title: Developer Tools Ctrl + Shift + J conflicts with Oracle PeopleSoft shortcut.
body: Provide the ability to turn off specific developer shortcuts. Ctrl + Shift + J conflicts with Oracle PeopleSoft shortcut.

comments.body: I agree this is annoying but my supervisor recently explained to me that Alt + Shift + J will work for Edge when troubleshooting via the PeopleSoft PIA.   Alt + Shift + J in Edge does what the PeopleSoft Ctrl + Shift + J shortcut does in IE.
